title: Chemical Guys HOL315 Foaming Citrus Fabric Clean, Easy-to-Use Drill Brush Carpet & Upholstery Fabric Cleaning Kit 16 fl oz
description: Clean and restore all of your fabrics, carpets, and upholstery in your car, home, office, and more with the Easy-To-Use Drill Brush Carpet & Upholstery Fabric Cleaning Kit! The foaming action of Foaming Citrus Fabric Clean combines with the scrubbing power of the Carpet Brush Drill attachment to harness the strength of your drill and lift deep set stains and filth from within fibers for easy cleaning of all of your fabric and carpet surfaces!
